snippet: Long favored by wealthy Italians, the 1956 Winter Olympics put Cortina d’Ampezzo on the world stage. Many properties trade discreetly among locals.
lead_paragraph: Long favored by wealthy Italians, the 1956 Winter Olympics put Cortina d’Ampezzo on the world stage. Many properties trade discreetly among locals.

headline.print_headline: House Hunting in ... the Italian Alps
headline.main: House Hunting in ... the Italian Alps
